description:
Cody has done work some major studios, and he wrote me telling me he had seen the Edge videos and he thought it would be really "horny" to do one.
Talked to him on the phone and realized he was Irish, and "horny" translated to "hot".
I shifted the concept to add a little suit and tie fetish - cuz, well, he looks fucking hot in a suit and tie. Maturity at its most refined.
Feel like I have been sucking a lot of cock lately. There are several more vids in the future that aren't "Edge" videos, where I end up on my knees. I really feel like I need to step away from the cock for a while, but I sure am getting a lot of requests for these vids
AND
Now that I have an official shopping cart, I am planning on doing a DVD compilation of all the edge videos, perhaps adding one bonus Edge video that wont even be on the site.
Thanks for all the positive feedback!
title: Bryan & Cody Boone - Edge
